item.title: armed men attack reuters gaza bureau
item.description: several armed men entered reuters' office in gaza on saturday, threatened employees with guns and took away a video camera, apparently after they spotted a reporter filming a demonstration from the building. the men struck one reuters journalist on the arm with a metal bar and threatened to throw another out of the window of the high-rise block. the group, which numbered about 10 men, smashed a television set and other equipment before leaving.
